quiz_item.error_analysis: 形近词“to hop”（跳）的拼写相似性导致学生将“to hope”误理解为“跳”或“跳跃”。
quiz_item.sentence: She always **hopes** to visit Paris with her family during the summer vacation.

option.definition: 希望（to want something to happen and believe it might be possible）
跳（to jump on one foot or move quickly）
打开（to make something not closed）
等待（to stay in a place until someone or something comes）
